entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
